dashboard.weeklySummaryEmpty: No analysis available yet. Keep scanning!
dashboard.weeklySummaryNotEnoughData: Scan a few more receipts this week to unlock your weekly spending analysis!
dashboard.welcomeLine1: Your scanned receipts will appear here.
dashboard.welcomeLine2: Upload one above to get started.

error.title: Oh no!
error.failedAnalysis: Failed to analyze the receipt. The image might be unclear or the format is not supported. Please try again.

modal.title: Receipt Details
modal.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this receipt? This action cannot be undone.

chatbot.greetingWithData: Hi! I'm Savvy. I've analyzed your receipts. Ask me anything about your spending, like 'Where did I spend the most last month?' or 'Summarize my grocery expenses.'
chatbot.greetingWithoutData: Hi! I'm Savvy, your personal finance assistant. Once you scan some receipts, I can help you analyze your spending. How can I help you in general today?
chatbot.error: Sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again later.
